    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3190</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3190</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El joc de la Lada</string>
            <string language="en">Lada's game</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel Ladas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le jeu de Lada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo de Lada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco del Lada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδι Lada</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Activitats amb personatges (relacionar-ne les meitats), disfresses (vestir-los amb peces de roba i complements), menjar (preparar menús) i trencaclosques.</string>
            <string language="en">Activities with dolls (join the halves), costumes (garments and accessories), food (prepare menus) and jigsaws.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">atenció</string>
            <string language="en">attention</string>
            <string language="es">atención</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">pensament lògic</string>
            <string language="en">logical thinking</string>
            <string language="es">pensamiento lógico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">percepció</string>
            <string language="en">perception</string>
            <string language="es">percepción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">raonament</string>
            <string language="en">reasoning</string>
            <string language="es">razonamiento</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktivitäten mit Puppen (verbinden Sie die 
Hälften), Kostümen (Kleider und Zusatzgeräte), Nahrung (bereiten 
Sie Menüs) vor und Tischlerbandsägen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activités avec des poupées (joignez les 
moitiés), des costumes (vêtements et accessoires), la nourriture 
(préparez les menus) et des scies sauteuses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividades com bonecas (junte as metades), trajes 
(garments e acessórios), alimento (prepare menus) e jigsaws.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività con le bambole (unisca le metà), i 
costumi (indumenti ed accessori), l'alimento (prepari i menu) ed i 
jigsaws.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητες με τις κούκλες (ενώστε τα μισά), τα 
κοστούμια (ενδύματα και εξαρτήματα), τα τρόφιμα (προετοιμάστε 
τους καταλόγους επιλογής) και τα τορνευτικά πριόνια.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufmerksamkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">logisches Denken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Argumentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pensée logique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">perception</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">raisonnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atenção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pensar lógico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">percepção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raciocínio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attenzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pensare logico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ragionamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσοχή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογική σκέψη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντίληψη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συλλογισμός</string>
          </keyword>
